document_data.mainbody:
Feonor was a human warlord in Avernus in the late 15 century DR.
Feonor was easily recognisable by her milky-white eyes and her parasol made of bones and flesh.
Feonors most distinctive personality characteristic was her constant annoyance at all the multiverse around her. Because of this, she spoke only by whispering and using short sentences.
Once Feonor lived in an unknown Prime Material plane but was invited to Avernus by Mahadi. However, after arriving in Hell she grew bored of Mahadis attentions and decided to leave the Wandering Emporium and to become one of the warlords of Avernus by the . 
Mahadi was fascinated by her zombie-like personality and still resented her departure.
